channel.title: Please help!
channel.description: can anyone help me with port forwarding on d-link 2740R here are some screen shots, i can't seem to get it to work :mad: i have tried everything, any help would be much appreciated thanks!

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @RusterG RusterG
item.description:

Done it, thanks for all of the help Sanskrit really helped with that portforwarding software.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

Turn off the windows firewall and switch the connection of the anti virus (ie direct connection, home network, etc.) I had issues with this until i changed the connection network of my antivirus firewall, and then the port could be reached.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @RusterG RusterG
item.description:
@RusterG wrote:

just done the think on my firewall, still not working! dang what is wrong, i have 2 firewalls, 1 with my anti virus and windows firewall is it possible for 2 too be active at the same time?

Read full topic

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @Junes Junes
item.description:
@Junes wrote:

within 2 minutes i can now get your ip address lol you are very smart with the open port checker lmfao… next time block out the entire ip address not just the very last bit lol.

anywho have you tried the utorrent portforward method?
have you opened the ports in your computers firewall?

Read full topic
